destinations.name: Goa
destinations.description: India's party capital with pristine beaches, Portuguese heritage, and a laid-back vibe. Perfect for beach lovers, nightlife enthusiasts, and history buffs.

destinations.name: Kerala
destinations.description: God's Own Country - famous for backwaters, tea plantations, Ayurveda, and pristine nature. A perfect blend of culture, wellness, and natural beauty.

destinations.name: Rajasthan
destinations.description: The Land of Kings - majestic forts, palaces, deserts, and rich cultural heritage. Experience royal India at its finest.

destinations.name: Manali
destinations.description: A hill station in the Himalayas, perfect for adventure sports and mountain views. Gateway to snow-capped peaks and thrilling activities.
destinations.bestTimeToVisit: March to June, October to December

destinations.name: Darjeeling
destinations.description: Queen of the Hills - famous for tea plantations, toy train, and stunning views of Kanchenjunga. A serene mountain retreat.
destinations.bestTimeToVisit: March to May, October to November

destinations.name: Shimla
destinations.description: The summer capital of British India - colonial architecture, scenic views, and pleasant weather. Perfect for a family getaway.
destinations.bestTimeToVisit: March to June, September to November

destinations.name: Varanasi
destinations.description: The spiritual capital of India - ancient ghats, Ganga Aarti, and rich cultural heritage. A transformative experience for the soul.

destinations.name: Agra
destinations.description: Home to the iconic Taj Mahal - one of the Seven Wonders of the World. A city of love, history, and architectural marvels.

packages.Overview: A perfect beach holiday for couples with pristine beaches, water sports, and vibrant nightlife.
packages.Hotel_Examples: Taj Exotica Goa, Novotel Goa Dona Sylvia
packages.Inclusions: 4★ beachfront resort stay with breakfast, airport transfers, water sports (jet ski, parasailing), North Goa sightseeing, casino entry, sunset cruise

packages.SEO_Title: Goa Beach Holiday Package | 4-Night Couple Escape with Water Sports
packages.SEO_Description: Experience the best of Goa with a 4-night beachfront resort stay, water sports, North Goa sightseeing, and vibrant nightlife.
packages.SEO_Keywords: Goa package, Goa beach holiday, couple trip Goa, water sports Goa

Guest_Reviews.name: Rahul & Priya
Guest_Reviews.content: Amazing beach holiday! The water sports were thrilling and the resort was perfect for a romantic getaway.

Guest_Reviews.name: Amit Sharma
Guest_Reviews.content: Great value for money. The North Goa tour was well organized and the beaches were beautiful.

cancellation: Free cancellation up to 7 days before travel

FAQ_Items.question: What is the best time to visit Goa?
FAQ_Items.answer: November to February is the peak season with pleasant weather, clear skies, and perfect beach conditions. Avoid monsoon season (June to September).

FAQ_Items.question: Do I need a visa for Goa?
FAQ_Items.answer: No visa required for Indian citizens. International travelers should check visa requirements based on their nationality.

FAQ_Items.question: Are water sports included in the package?
FAQ_Items.answer: Yes, the package includes jet skiing and parasailing. Additional water sports can be booked at extra cost.

packages.Overview: Experience the backwaters, tea plantations, and Ayurveda in God's Own Country. A perfect blend of nature and wellness.

packages.SEO_Keywords: Kerala backwaters package, houseboat Kerala, Munnar tea gardens, Ayurveda Kerala

Guest_Reviews.name: Sneha Patel
Guest_Reviews.content: The houseboat experience was incredible! Munnar's tea gardens were breathtaking. Highly recommend this package.

FAQ_Items.question: What is included in the houseboat stay?
FAQ_Items.answer: The houseboat includes comfortable accommodation, all meals, and a cruise through the backwaters with beautiful views of paddy fields and villages.

FAQ_Items.question: Is Ayurveda treatment included?
FAQ_Items.answer: Yes, one Ayurveda spa session is included. Additional treatments can be booked at the resort.

packages.Overview: Royal Rajasthan - Explore the majestic forts and palaces of Jaipur, Udaipur, and Jodhpur. Experience the grandeur of royal India.
packages.Hotel_Examples: Taj Lake Palace Udaipur, Rambagh Palace Jaipur, Umaid Bhawan Palace Jodhpur
packages.Inclusions: 7N heritage palace hotel stay with breakfast & dinner, private transfers, guided tours of Jaipur City Palace & Hawa Mahal, Udaipur Lake Palace visit, Jodhpur Fort tour, camel safari in Jaisalmer, cultural show, shopping for handicrafts
packages.Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrive Jaipur | Day 2: Jaipur city tour (City Palace, Hawa Mahal, Jantar Mantar) | Day 3: Transfer to Udaipur | Day 4: Udaipur city tour (Lake Palace, City Palace) | Day 5: Transfer to Jodhpur | Day 6: Jodhpur Fort & blue city | Day 7: Jaisalmer camel safari | Day 8: Departure
packages.SEO_Title: Royal Rajasthan Heritage Tour | 7-Night Palace Hotels & Forts
packages.SEO_Description: Experience the grandeur of royal Rajasthan with stays in heritage palaces, guided tours of forts, and cultural experiences across Jaipur, Udaipur, and Jodhpur.
packages.SEO_Keywords: Rajasthan tour package, Jaipur Udaipur Jodhpur, heritage palace hotels, royal Rajasthan

Guest_Reviews.name: Arjun & Kavya
Guest_Reviews.content: Absolutely magical! Staying in heritage palaces was a dream come true. The guided tours were excellent.

FAQ_Items.question: What makes these heritage hotels special?
FAQ_Items.answer: These are former royal palaces converted into luxury hotels, offering authentic royal experiences with modern amenities.

FAQ_Items.question: Is the camel safari included?
FAQ_Items.answer: Yes, a camel safari in Jaisalmer desert is included in the package.

FAQ_Items.question: What is the difference between shared and private transfers?
FAQ_Items.answer: Shared transfers mean you'll travel with other guests, while private transfers are exclusive to your group. Shared transfers are more economical.

packages.Overview: An adventure-packed mountain holiday with skiing, paragliding, and stunning Himalayan views.
packages.Seasonality: March to June, October to December
packages.Hotel_Examples: The Himalayan Resort, Snow Valley Resorts
packages.Inclusions: 4N mountain resort stay with breakfast, airport transfers, Rohtang Pass visit, Solang Valley activities (skiing/paragliding), Hadimba Temple visit, river rafting, Old Manali exploration
packages.Exclusions: Flights, lunches, dinners, adventure activity equipment rental
packages.Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrive Manali & check-in | Day 2: Rohtang Pass & Solang Valley | Day 3: Adventure activities (skiing/paragliding) | Day 4: River rafting & Old Manali | Day 5: Departure
packages.SEO_Title: Manali Adventure Package | 4-Night Skiing & Paragliding Holiday
packages.SEO_Description: Thrilling mountain adventure in Manali with skiing, paragliding, river rafting, and visits to Rohtang Pass and Solang Valley.
packages.SEO_Keywords: Manali adventure package, skiing Manali, paragliding Manali, Rohtang Pass

Guest_Reviews.name: Aditya & Friends
Guest_Reviews.content: Amazing adventure trip! Paragliding was the highlight. The resort had great mountain views.

FAQ_Items.question: What adventure activities are included?
FAQ_Items.answer: The package includes skiing (in season), paragliding, and river rafting. Equipment rental may be extra.

FAQ_Items.question: Is Rohtang Pass always accessible?
FAQ_Items.answer: Rohtang Pass is accessible from May to November. During winter, it may be closed due to snow. Alternative activities will be arranged.
